who wasn't For six years, Larry Page and Sergey Brin told Eric Schmidt that Google Inc. should build its own browser, and for six years, he resisted. '' Google Inc. was a small company,'' Eric Schmidt remembered. Having come through the bruising browser wars, I didn't want to do that again. So Sergey Brin and Page hired some ex-Firefox developers and had them build a prototype. the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Denver Nuggets 108-97 Tuesday night in Allen Iverson 's first game against his former team. It was weird to see him wearing a white jersey and we're wearing black,'' Kyle Korver said. Elgin Baylor said to one of our coaches that it is so weird to see him on the other side. It wasn't really a good feeling at all. He's a great player and he meant a lot to Philadelphia. Allen Iverson scored 30 points on 10-of-24 shooting before getting tossed for his second technical with 1:44 remaining.
